message.body: Hey... I heard marc asked for PlayStation games for Christmas. If he asks for a wrestling one I already bought him one for Christmas. I ordered it about a week ago
The one I got him is called something like 2K14. It has a red front cover.
Ok waiting for him to tell me what game for me to by him still waiting
He has the new hocky one
He does have nh 13 on him i give it to him flyers one
Yea I saw a few games on his bed (I know noting about video games lol).. I just know I got him a wrestling one and he doesn't know about it
So idk if he'll ask for it since he didn't know lol
No he did not some of tham games he don't play only 4 games that he likes to play flyers one lol and oops one and two lol
The oops game he will be playing lot with Jamie later she kick ### in that with marc lol
I never even heard of it lol
Go play it lol it fun
Did you see his ice skates
Lol ok... and yea they were nice
